name: SEO Flow by LupsOnline
author: LupsOnline

sections.description:
High performance tool for linkbuilders to place and manage partner links and blogs on all websites on one central platform

ðŸš€ ðŸš€ ðŸš€ ðŸš€ ðŸš€

SEO Flow is the solution for linkbuilders who regularly place links and guest blogs on a number of sites. It works by connecting the sites to a central platform where you can easily post blogs and upload a .CSV with all the backlinks. Overall, SEO Flow can save you many hours a week and improve your SEO impact.

BOOST YOUR LINKBUILDING

Accelerate your linkbuilding: Placing partner links and guest blogs for your link partners goes much faster with SEO Flow.
Manage your links in one place: SEO Flow comes with a centralized portal where you can find and manage all your placed links and blogs for all the connected websites.
Upload your backlinks with .CSV: Use the standard format to upload and place tens or even hundreds of backlinks in one go.
Increase your linkbuilding: Faster linkbuilding for your partners means you can exchange or sell a lot more links and guest blogs.
Be more efficient in less time: with SEO Flow, you save time with placing links and blogs. Time that you can now use for your clients or other SEO tasks.

FREE VERSION
Unlimited installations
100 links and 10 guest blogs for free every month
No support, we do have an extended knowledge base with FAQs and how-tos.

Our free version is a great way to start improving the way you build links through link exchange. Without charge, you can build 100 links and 10 guest blogs every month. And when you are ready to bring your linkbuilding next level? We have the options to meet your needs.

PRO FEATURES

Unlimited installations
Place more links and guest blogs to every month
E-mail support
Multiple logins for your team

Ideal for senior linkbuilders or agencies that will notice a rapid increase in productivity when using SEO Flow.

BUILT FORâ€¦.

âœ” LINK BUILDERS
A key part to linkbuilding is link exchange: you place links and blogs on your sites, and your partner does the same for you on their sites. Without tooling, this is tedious manual work at the cost of your strategic and client related tasks. Put your focus where it is needed and automate the placing of links with SEO Flow.

âœ” (SEO) AFFILIATES AND BLOGGERS
Are you maintaining a number of websites on which you regularly post blogs? Centralize your blog posting with SEO Flow! One login for all your sites with a clear WYSIWYG editor that meets your standard needs. The blog is placed on the website along with any uploaded media, so if you use any specific plugin you can tweak your blog on the site at your leisure.

âœ” AGENCIES
Do you offer SEO as a service to a number of clients with a specialized team? SEO Flow offers you a centralized tool for placing partner links and managing blog posts on all the sites in your SEO network. Save valuable time and increase production of your team members by providing them with SEO Flow.

BUILT BY LINK BUILDERS

Michael Lups is a WordPress specialist who designs and develops SEO Flow. First as a personal tool to improve his own efficiency. Later, when Thomas Lapperre joined for doing the marketing and sales, as a SEO tool for streamlining linkbuilding and accelerating SEO success.

ADDITIONAL RESOURCES

How it works â€“ description of how SEO Flow works.
FAQ and support â€“ Comprehensive and extended FAQs about SEO Flow
Knowledge base â€“ Educational how-tos and blogs from our team about linkbuilding, link exchange, SEO, content creation with ChatGPT and WordPress.
sections.installation:
Installing and connecting SEO Flow is easy!

Download the plugin and upload it on your WordPress website. Or search for SEO Flow in the plugins page after clicking add new plugin.
Activate the plugin through the plugins page in WordPress.
Register your account â€“ free or paid â€“ on our platform.
Register the website on the platform with the URL of the site and the partner page, and the page ID of the partner page. Register the given API-code in the settings of the SEO Flow plugin.

All set! You can now log in on our platform with your account and place backlinks and blogs on your connected website. Add more websites to increase productivity. Need help? Check the how-tos in our knowledge base. We also offer paid services to install and connect your sites from 10 sites.
sections.faq:
What is linkbuilding and what is it good for?

Linkbuilding is the process of acquiring and placing hyperlinks from other websites to your own site. It’s a crucial aspect of SEO (Search Engine Optimization) that helps improve your website’s authority and visibility in search engine results. Linkbuilding can boost your site’s credibility and attract more organic traffic.

Will the plugin slow down the website?

No, the plugin is designed to be high-performance and efficient. It will not slow down your website’s performance.

Will the plugin improve my rankings? Why not?

The plugin itself won’t directly improve your rankings. It’s a tool that helps streamline your linkbuilding efforts, making it more efficient to manage partner links and guest blogs. Improving your rankings requires a holistic SEO strategy that includes various factors such as content quality, backlink diversity, site structure, and more. When placing partner links and guest blogs for your partners goes faster, this saves you valuable time you can spend on these other factors.

How does the plugin really work?

The plugin works by connecting your websites to a centralized platform via an API-code. You can upload a .CSV file containing your backlinks and easily post blogs. This accelerates your linkbuilding process, helps manage links and blogs in one place, and saves you time.

How will SEO Flow help streamline my linkbuilding?

SEO Flow centralizes a part of your linkbuilding: the part where you place links and guest blogs for partners in exchange for links and blogs on their websites. Through SEO Flow you can do this centralized, using a .CSV format for tens or even hundreds of backlinks. This saves you time and increases productivity in your linkbuilding activities.

How is placing partner links and guest blogs related to my SEO success?

Placing partner links and guest blogs on relevant sites is a key aspect of linkbuilding. This enhances your website’s authority and establishes connections within your niche, which can positively impact your SEO success by improving your site’s visibility and search engine rankings. These partner links and guest blogs can be bought or exchanged.

On how many websites can I place the plugin?

The plugin allows you to place it on an unlimited number of websites. Whether you have multiple personal sites or manage sites for clients, you can use the plugin across all of them.

Can I use a specific plugin for posting blogs via SEO Flow?

No, you canâ€™t. SEO Flow offers a general WYSIWYG-editor that incorporated standard WordPress functions like headers, bulletpoints, placing video URLs and uploading images. Handy plugins such as SEO Flow, Rank Math and SEO Yoast are not â€“ repeat not – incorporated. After posting your blogs, you can login to the specific website and tweak the blog to your wishes.

Is SEO Flow compatible with all the plugins on my sites?

While the plugin is designed to work seamlessly with WordPress, it’s important to ensure compatibility with other plugins you have installed. Generally, it should work well with most plugins, but it’s recommended to test it immediately after installing. Come across any issues? Check our FAQ and knowledge base.

How can I get support?

The free version of the plugin offers support through an extended knowledge base with FAQs and how-to guides. The Pro version includes e-mail support, providing more direct assistance for any issues or questions you may have.

How can I upgrade from the free version to the Pro version?

Upgrading from the free version to the Pro version of SEO Flow is simple. Once you’ve decided to take your linkbuilding efforts to the next level, you can easily upgrade within the plugin’s settings. Click on the “Upgrade” option, choose your version, and follow the prompts to complete the upgrade process. Our system will guide you through the payment process, and your upgraded features will be activated immediately.

How can I ensure the security of my account and data when using SEO Flow?

We take your security seriously. SEO Flow prioritizes the protection of your account and data. When you register your account, you’ll set up secure login credentials. We use 2FA for logging in to the platform. Additionally, all communication between your WordPress sites and the centralized platform is encrypted to safeguard your data. Our team regularly monitors and updates our security protocols to stay ahead of potential threats and ensure your peace of mind while using SEO Flow.
